body:
So Yea, As you should know, one of the best pvpers on avicus which is me is banned. Actually I am just decent, Fluenza_ and some other noobs to can kill me. So On November 11, when I was casually pvping on nexus, sunrise728 showed up and said I was hacking. If you are reading this sunrise728 I was not even hacking, it was just pure lag. So Guys, if you want me unbanned, please support me and help me gain justice. If you hate me and want me to leave, then just comment down below.

Thanks,
nerfgun2002

title: Read This Guys. I need Support!

replies.body: I am sorry for your ban, but this isn't the place.  Please email support@avicus.net to appeal your ban.  Good Luck!
replies.body_tagged: I am sorry for your ban, but this isn't the place.  Please email support@avicus.net to appeal your ban.  Good Luck!

replies.body: Just fuck off. I'm glad you're banned, you hacked. "One of the best pvpers on Avicus", LOL, no.
